title: Zo Centurions
description: First 5 Members to reach 100 active invites on Zo World discord get a founder card each

title: Level Up
description: First 5 members to reach level 10 on discord get a Founder card each. Level up by gaining Xp which is granted based on your conversations with other members, your reactions to emojis, how many people you interact; I guess what we are trying to say is just stay active on discord and you'll be rewarded.

title: Milestone Drop
description: 1 Founder Card giveaway at every 500 member milestone on Zo World discord community. The next one coming up at 1000, 1500, 2000 members and so on till 5000.

title: Early Birds - 1
description: 5 random giveaways to the first 1000 members on the discord channel. The giveaway happens as soon as we reach 1000 members on discord

title: Tweeple Giveaways
description: Retweet the Twitter Giveaway thread, follow Zo World and tag 2 friends. We'll pick one winner everyday to win a Zo World founder card worth 0.1 ETH each.

title: Evangeliser
description: Draw the Zo World symbol \z/ using anything, anywhere, at any place, on a beach in the sand, on your plate using cutlery, on a paper using a pen, and post on twitter using #BecomeAFounder and tagging 2 friends. The winning \z/ gets displayed as our DP across all channels and a founder card worth 0.1 ETH each day.

title: Get Set, Zo! - 1
description: First 2 members to reach 300 messages on Zo World discord gets a founder card

title: Inked!
description: Get a tattoo of the Zo symbol \z/ in any creative style you want. The tattoo has to be minimum 1.5 * 1.5 inches in size. Submit a video of you getting the permanent tattoo and the first 5 submissions get a founder card each. 6 additional cards up for grabs based on the best 6 tattoos

title: Seeders
description: Top active invite holders at the time of 5000 discord members

title: Zo Memers
description: 2 giveaways based on winner of meme contest. The contest opens at 1000 discord members and continues until the member count is 2000. Memes are to be made on active topics related to conversations happening on the Zo World discord channel.

title: Early Birds - 2
description: 5 random giveaways to the next 2000 members on the discord channel. The giveaway happens as soon as we reach 3000 members on discord

title: Wise Owl
description: Zoom AMA/Townhall giveaways

title: Avatar Raffle
description: Change your twitter, instagram, discord DP to a random Zomad avatar from zo.xyz + a Zo World introduction post with #thezoworld tag. The post has to stay active until the raffle winner is announcement at each stage. The raffle is announced at 1000, 2000, 3000, 4000, 5000 discord members

title: Daily Challenge
description: 24H Invite challenge. The member with the most invites in 24 hours get's a foundr card. Giveaway unlocks at 1000 discord members

title: What's in a Name
description: Change Discord Name to Zomad/ZoWorld and enter the raffle to win a founder card. Giveaway happens at 4000 discord members

title: Daily Challenge
description: 24H Xp challenge - The member to gain the most Xp in a 24H window gets a founder card. Contest unlocks at 2500 Discord members.

title: Get Set, Zo! - 2
description: Next 2 members to reach 600 messages on Zo World discord gets a founder card

title: Get Set, Zo! - 3
description: Next 2 members to reach 1200 messages on Zo World discord gets a founder card

title: Twitter Raiders
description: Twitter Giveaway - Become a founder tweet - Like and follow @The_Zo_World, retweet and tag 3 friends to enter the raffle. The first 2 post to reach 100 likes get a founder card giveaway

title: Influencer Reachouts
description: DM, Reach out to best influencers pitching Zo world, get a reply from them share screenshot

title: DAO Pao
description: The community chooses 2 random Zomads through a voting system to be winner of 2 giveaways

title: Big Daddy
description: 2 Giveaways on successfully inviting NFT prjoject leaders from any of the top 100 NFT projects on opensea. 1 for the invitee and 1 for the leader.

title: Pioneers
description: 2 Giveaways on successfully inviting any holder of BAYC/Crytpopunks to Zo World. 1 for the invitee, 1 for the BAYC/Punk holder
